metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14851 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A denial of service vulnerability was discovered in nbdkit. A client issuing a certain sequence of commands could possibly trigger an assertion failure, causing nbdkit to exit. This issue only affected nbdkit versions 1.12.7, 1.14.1, and 1.15.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-14851` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nbdkit - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-guestfs - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-libvirt - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-lua - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-perl - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-python - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-ruby - 1.14.2-3
nbdkit-plugin-tcl - 1.14.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nbdkit package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.2-3').
